summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Melrose Avenue North from East Denny Way to East Roy Street et al., in the City of Seattle, by paving with asphalt under Ordinance No. 21194, creating Local Improvement District No. 2100 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
